objectClasses.name: User
objectClasses.description: User entity with attributes like ID, name, email, and permissions for managing user accounts.

objectClasses.name: Group
objectClasses.description: A group entity, part of the principals collection, representing a collection of users or other principals.

objectClasses.name: Role
objectClasses.description: Role entity defining permissions and access levels within projects or the system.

objectClasses.name: Membership
objectClasses.description: Links a principal (user or group) to a project with specific roles, representing membership assignments.

objectClasses.name: Project
objectClasses.description: An organizational unit representing a project within the system, with its own permissions and memberships.

objectClasses.name: Permission
objectClasses.description: A capability or access right granted to a role or user.

objectClasses.name: UserModel
objectClasses.description: User principal with login, name, email, and permissions

objectClasses.name: GroupModel
objectClasses.description: Group principal representing a collection of users

objectClasses.name: RoleModel
objectClasses.description: Role with permissions assigned to users or groups

objectClasses.name: ProjectModel
objectClasses.description: Project representing an organizational unit or workspace

objectClasses.name: Capability
objectClasses.description: Represents a capability, which is a combination of an action, a principal, and a context (e.g., project or global), indicating permissions.

objectClasses.name: Action
objectClasses.description: Defines an action that can be performed, such as creating or updating resources, related to permissions.

objectClasses.name: OAuthApplication
objectClasses.description: An OAuth 2.0 application registered within the system, associated with client credentials.

objectClasses.name: OAuthClientCredentials
objectClasses.description: Credentials for an OAuth 2.0 client, indicating whether the application is confidential.

objectClasses.name: PlaceholderUser
objectClasses.description: A placeholder user, a type of principal used for temporary or non-human user representations.

objectClasses.name: StorageFileModel
objectClasses.description: File attached to a project or work package

objectClasses.name: Attachment
objectClasses.description: A file attachment entity with metadata such as file name, size, and download links.

objectClasses.name: Users
objectClasses.description: User's full name, formatting depends on instance settings
